abstract: To open the season, Plácido Domingo will sing the title role in Puccini’s one-act opera “Gianni Schicchi” and then, after the intermission, move down to the orchestra pit to conduct Leoncavallo’s “Pagliacci.”
snippet: To open the season, Plácido Domingo will sing the title role in Puccini’s one-act opera “Gianni Schicchi” and then, after the intermission, move down to the orchestra pit to conduct Leoncavallo’s “Pagliacci.”

headline.main: Los Angeles Opera Season to Open With Domingo Singing 'Gianni Schicchi'
headline.print_headline: The Singing Conductor: Busy Night for Domingo
